org.apache.pig.piggybank.evaluation.math

Class IntMin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.pig.EvalFunc<java.lang.Integer>
      • org.apache.pig.piggybank.evaluation.math.IntMin

  • public class IntMin
extends org.apache.pig.EvalFunc<java.lang.Integer>
    math.min implements a binding to the Java function Math.min(int,int) for computing the the min value of the arguments. The returned value will be an int which is the minimum of the inputs.
    Parameters:
    value - 2 int values.
    Return Value:
    int min value of two input
    Return Schema:
    min_inputSchema
    Example:
    register math.jar;
    A = load 'mydata' using PigStorage() as ( float1 );
    B = foreach A generate float1, math.min(float1);
    Author:
    ajay garg
    See Also:
    Math#min(double),
